Large: 3/4" wide - fits neck from 15-19"

name: K9 Pawdicure Polish Pens
description:
A patented Pawdicure Polish Pen is water based, odorless, non-toxic, dries in under 40 seconds and is great for nail art!

Available Red, Pink, Purple, Blue, White, Yellow


These Nail Polish Pens apply a quick drying, non-toxic, coat of polish that is easy to remove. Only one layer application is necessary for that great look for your pampered pup. On dark nails, we suggest doing a base coat of white first and then a color for a better result.

name: LED Glow Dog Collar
description:
Each LED Lights Collar is made of super-sturdy nylon and satin, and comes in an array of candy colors including red, yellow, green, blue and pink.You get 60 hours of steady light, or over 100 hours of flashing light with each collar. Normal 4-5 months; battery can be replaced.  All batteries in each set are replaceable, and you can choose from two flashing speeds and one steady light speed.

Bright light can be seen from far away.
Helps to keep you and your dog & other pets safe during walking.
Provide safety for your dog while it's out at night.

Note: Led cable can be easily remove for washable purposes.

Sizes are an approximate.
S   =    0.98" Wide x 13" to 17.75" Long (Adjustable Strap)
M  =    0.98" Wide x 14.5" to 18.90" Long (Adjustable Strap)
L   =    0.98" Wide x 17" to 20.45" Long (Adjustable Strap)
XL =    0.98" Wide x 20" to 23.65" Long (Adjustable Strap)

name: Double Layer Fleece Dog Coats
description:
Lux Dog Coats
Double Layer Fleece Dog Coats    MADE in the USA! 

Coats and straps are double-ply for extra warmth and durability. 
Our coats have long overlapping straps for maximum adjustability.

• Our solid color coats are constructed from 400 gram anti pill velour fleece. 
• Coats with prints are constructed from 330 gram anti pill velour fleece.
• Charcoal fabric is made from 100% recycled plastic bottles.

options.name: XSmall Long Baby Pink Polka Dots

name: ORGANIC NOSE BUTTER
description:
NOSE BUTTER -for dry, cracked, crusty noses
Handcrafted in northern Minnesota-  Organic Shea Butter, organic castor oil, organic olive oil, organic avocado oil, organic almond oil, organic coconut oil, organic beeswax, organic cocoa seed butter

Simply rub across the top of their nose 2-3x a day for 2-3 days and then gently rub the crusts off with a bit of tissue. Some dogs will lose the crust in a day, others need a bit more time. Use your own judgment. Then use as needed for maintenance. Some dogs need Nose Butter daily, others once a week or so is enough. If your dog licks at their nose, no worries, Nose Butter is all organic and won't hurt them.

name: Happytails K9 Spa - Dry Dog Instant Clean
description:
Dry Dog Instant Clean 9oz
Bath Replacement Spray, waterless shampoo and dry bath

Doesn't just mask odors, it gets rid of them
- Quick, easy and convenient
- All natural Ordinone is safe and effective
- Refreshing scent of kiwi mellon

This powerful all natural formula cleanses without water, rinsing or mess. Unlike other bath replacement sprays Dry Dog Instant Clean doesn’t just mask bad smells with heavy perfume it eradicates them completely, An all natural ingredient called Ordenone traps the odor-causing proteins leaving your high speed hound refreshed renewed and ready for his next appointment.

Dry Dog Instant clean is the perfect between-grooming freshen up spray. Keep a bottle by the door for those muddy paws, or use it when your best friend is starting to smell a little musty. It's a lifesaver if you have company coming over and have no time to wash the dog.

Keeping carpets clean

When outdoor dogs come back indoors they often bring the outdoors with them. Use Dry Dog Instant Clean to clean their paws and prevent dirt and mud being tracked into our white carpets. Also a quick spritz on dog beds works wonders.

name: NFL Licensed New York Giants K9 Jerseys
description:
Show support for your favorite team with this great-looking jersey which features a screened-on city name and a small team logo on the front. Team Logo does not appear on the front of XS jersey due to size limitations. 

There is a sewn-on, woven NFL patch; screened-on team name and number on the back and sewn-on woven "Property Of" patch for writing your pet's name.  This jersey is Officially Licensed by the NFL and looks and feels like an actual players jersey with satin accents on the shoulders, sleeves and down the sides. Also has the perfect accent with the overlock stitching detail.

Machine wash cold and line dry. Perfect for game day or any occasion. 
Please DO NOT choose by label size. Choose by MEASURING your pet, please check the SIZE CHART before placing your order.

name: Happytails K9 Spa - Eyewipes
description:
Eye Wips - 50 Pads

- Contain no pharmaceuticals or chemicals
- Gentle, tearless formula
- Safe for even the youngest puppy
- Nothing to mix 
- Lavender refreshes the area

The reason tearstains are so hard to eradicate is that they are a visible symptom of a deeper systemic problem. The most common cause of the redness is yeast infection (epiphora) which in turn is produced by bacteria. That's why, if you want to get rid of tearstains, it's not enough to simply wipe the eyes with a cleansing product, you also need to surpress and destroy the bacteria that are causing the problem. 

Eyewipes are unique because they are infused with colloidal silver, an antibacterial nano-particle that is highly effective at killing the offending bacteria while leaving beneficial flora and fauna intact. 

Use convenient pre-moistened Eye Pads to remove the tearing residue from around a dog's eyes. Rub with and against the grain of the fur for maximum effectiveness. Please note that the pads will not completely "wipe away" the redness. By the time it's evident the epiphora has stained the whole hair, including the interior shaft. The only way to get rid of it (without bleaching, which of course is not recommended) is to cut away the stained hair. 

The Eyepads work to prevent the re-occurenece of the tearstains. When used regularly Eyepads will help keep your little guy looking his best. 

These statements have nor been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. Happytails products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

name: PetLit LED Collar Clip - 6 Options Available
description:
White light encased in durable, plastic housing and molded to a rugged plastic carabiner clip

Battery Run time: 24 Hours
Easily replaceable 1 x 927 3V lithium battery included
Water/Weather resistant
Secure clip - easy to attach and remove from the D-Ring of a pet's collar

Can also be attached it to your key ring, belt loop, zipper pull, backpack or purse, and you'll have efficient, bright illumination wherever you are, whenever you want.

name: Personalized Dog Collar with Name and Phone  BLACK AND WHITE POLKA DOTS
description:
Handmade item
3/4 inch wide adjustable dog collar
Materials: nylon webbing, welded D rings, quick release buckle,    ribbon
Made to order

ORDERING INFO-
PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION IN THE "NOTE TO SELLER"  AT CHECKOUT OR YOU CAN SUBMIT VIA "CONTACT US" LOCATED ON THIS WEBSITE **

#1) Collar Size -Measure your dogs collar according to the "measuring photo" This is the only measurement I need
Collars less than 12 inches- NAME ONLY.

#2) Personalization- Name will be embroidered as it appears so double check spelling and phone number.

#3) Thread color


If a mistake is made on your name and/or phone number another will be shipped to you ASAP.

Carefully check the size and width you are ordering. You cannot return or be refunded for the wrong size or width. If you measure according to the measuring photo, the collar will fit perfectly. 

Please remember that we custom make all orders one at a time. Please allow 1 week before shipping and 3-5 days to receive via usps first class mail. When your order is shipped you will receive an email with a tracking number. Let me know if you need an item sooner and we will do our best to accommodate you.

name: Dirty Dog Outdoor Shampoo
description:
Outdoor Shampoo
Green tea and Lime | 16oz

DIRTY & HAIRY'S SHAMPOO will cleanse, condition and protect your pet from the great outdoors. This gentle, fresh-smelling shampoo will not strip essential oils from your pet's skin, and will not wash out spot-on flea and tick products. There are no harsh detergents and the natural, human-grade ingredients are safe for people, puppies and other pets.
    
    • Infused with citronella.
    • No harsh detergents or artificial colors.

name: Dirty Dog Outdoor Spray
description:
Outdoor Spray
Green tea and Lime | 4oz

USE DIRTY & HAIRY'S REFRESHING SPRAY between adventures to keep your dog smelling fresh while protecting from the great outdoors. This spray contains a proprietary odor-eating ingredient that neutralizes odors to keep your pet and house odor-free. Your can also spray on bedding, carpets and upholstery. The natural human-grade ingredients are safe for people, puppies and pets. This product is perfect for those days when there's just not enough time to bathe the dog!

    * Infused with citronella.
    * Light and refreshing tea tree and lime

name: Happytails K9 Spa - Comfy Dog Oatmeal Shampoo
description:
Comfy Dog Oatmeal Shampoo  9oz 

Quick Relief for Dogs with Dry, Itchy Skin and Allergies

Helps Relieve
-Dry itchy or irritated skin
-Itching due to allergies
-Flaking and dander
-Incessant scratching
-Hot spots and irritation

You already know that oatmeal is the go-to ingredient for dry skin, however Comfy Dog sets the standard by using only human grade colloidal oatmeal (oat solids in suspension) rather than the inferior oat extract that some products use. This means faster results and long lasting relief

Approved by the FDA
Colloidal oatmeal is one of the few all natural ingredients that has been approved by the FDA for use in helping dry skin, insect bites and itching caused by allergies. It's used extensivly in human products because of it's power and effectiveness.

A complete spectrum of healing

The formula also contains botanical extracts of peppermint (an antiseptic agents that also acts as a natural insect repellent) burdock (an anti inflammatory), Indian frankincense (which is is perfect for dogs with sensitive skin) and calendula (used for centuries to heal and soothe irritation).

name: Happytails K9 Spa -Itchin' for Relief Anti Itch Spray
description:
Itchin' for Relief Anti Itch Spray  6.7oz

Helps Relieve
- Itching due to allergies
- Incessant scratching

Relief right where you need it! Our unique "nozzler" spray gets this soothing formula through the fur directly to itchy and irritated skin. No muss, no fuss, no wet dog or wasted product. Every drop of this all-natural product by-passes even the thickest coat and attacks the problem at the source. Itchin’ for Relief contains a blend of Neem, Oat Extract, Litchi and Aloe to soothe irritated skin while Boswellia Serrata & Calendula help to reduce inflammation. We’ve also included Grapefruit seed Extract to prevent both bacterial and fungal infections.

Easy to use, simply spray between the fur right on to the irritated skin.

Fast Acting the formula brings immediate relief but it's also...

Economical the "nozzler" allows you to use only the amount you need

Itchin' for Relief contains no SLS or Parabens..and of course, is cruelty free

name: Happytails K9 Spa - Flea the Scene Outdoor Spray
description:
Flea the Scene Outdoor Spray 7oz

- Contains no pesticides or poisons
- Completely safe even if ingested
- Full spectrum of effective, all natural ingredients
- Protects your best friend gently but completely
- Has a fresh, clean scent

Flea the Scene is a 3-in-1 spray that will take the sting out of summer. It is the ideal product for a trip to the dog park or a long walk on the beach with your best friend. It contains NO pesticides or poisons so It’s gentle on your dog’s delicate skin. However the proprietary blend of all natural ingredients is effective at keeping unwanted pests at a safe distance.

A quick spritz before you leave the house will ensure that your best friend is armed against all outdoor enemies.

Flea the scene is not intended to replace Frontline or Advantix but is an excellent complement to over the counter flea and tick products. In fact Flea the Scene is perfectly safe even if your dog licks it off. (of course we recommend that you discourage your dog from doing that) The formula is slightly waterproof but we recommend that you reapply after swimming or bathing.
**Flea the Scene all-natural protection for those sunny days.**

name: Happytails K9 Spa - Bubbles 'n Beads Shampoo & Conditioner
description:
Bubbles 'n Beads Shampoo & Conditioner 9oz

Time-saving 2 in 1 shampoo and conditioner
- Micro-beads deliver vitamins and conditioners directly to the skin
- Makes the coat noticeably softer to the touch
- Blend of 11 Amino Acids improves strength and shine
- Refreshing scent lasts for days after bathing

The Advanced Formula
With 11 amino acids like Arginine, Glycine and Alanine, Bubbles n' Beads provides essential nourishment for damaged and dull hair. Like all of our shampoos it is free of SLS and uses a gentle coconut based surfactant to clean the hair without stripping it of it's natural oils. We've also added Brazil Nut Oil one of the richest sources of selenium, a mineral which helps to nourish the hair, Jesuits Balsam and Aloe Leaf Extract that help reduce itching and also contains minerals, proteins and enzymes that help soften the coat and soothe the skin

Fabulous aroma
We've incorporated essential oil of lavender into the formula that not only helps clean and refresh but also smells wonderful and lasts for days after bathing.

name: Happytails K9 Spa - Sparkle & Shine Brightening Shampoo
description:
Sparkle & Shine Brightening Shampoo 9oz
Brightening Shampoo that brings out the shine in any color of coat

- Clean and brighten a dull coat
- Refresh the color of an older dog's coat
- Uses all natural brighteners like yogurt and honey
- Has a fresh clean scent (Vanilla)

All natural Sparkle & Shine Shampoo is perfect for any dog whose coat needs brightening but is especially good for dogs with light-colored or white coats. Pearlescent brighteners enhance the natural luminescence of the hair, while all natural emollients like flax seed and honey refresh the silky texture. 

Round out the formula with yogurt and comfrey to condition and heal broken skin and you have the complete shampoo that will bring new life to faded fur.

Our most gentle shampoo

For easy rinsing, the shampoo does not overly lather, it is our most gentle formula which contains no SLS or Parabens, uses a coconut based surfactant...and of course, is cruelty free. The tearless shampoo is safe for even the smallest puppy

name: ORGANIC BOO BOO BUTTER
description:
BOO BOO BUTTER 
Is a rich salve/balm/ointment, Dog Balm for your dog’s discomforts. Made for scrapes, bumps, bruises, ouchies, itchies and owies. Boo Boo Butter is something you need to have on hand (on paw?) at all times. Take advantage of the healing qualities of herbs and botanicals for your dog. Perfectly crafted for abrasions (brush burn, clipper burn, Sunburn), scrapes, bug bites, poison ivy-like issues, and such. Dogs that gets nicks and cuts on their tails from wagging and banging are well served by Boo Boo Butter.

Made of organic fair trade shea butter, therapeutic grade essential oils, organic castor oil, organic jojoba oil, organic olive oil, organic avocado oil, organic beeswax, reiki, organic st johns wort, organic calendula, organic neem oil, organic pumpkin oil, organic comfrey

Available in 1oz tin

name: Chistmas Dog Bandana - Made to Order
description:
Each Bandana is double sided, made of 100% cotton fabric, includes 2" velcro closure and is machine washable. 

Bandanas are available in XS, S, M, L, XL, GIANT

ORDERING THE CORRECT SIZE:

1) measure your dog's neck

2) add 5" or more to fold over & Velcro  -  Less to only Velcro 

3)this measurement is the length required on the longest side of the triangle (the side that goes around doggie's neck). Please refer to actual measurements below to select the right size.

Size Chart 
Measurement is from one tip of the tie to the other tip, lengthwise
Extra Small: 16"
Small: 19"
Medium: 25"
Large: 31"
XLarge: 34" 
Giant : 36"
Custom orders are welcome!
